ast.base

Class RBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • ast.base.RBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ASTNode<fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.PositionI>, Base, java.io.Serializable

    public class RBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements Base
    This class represents a base with a dynamic position determined by the execution in the abstract syntax tree (AST) of queries. It extends the Base class and implements the eval method to return the position of the base during execution.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
